# Deltarune Online Hub - LLMs.txt
# This file provides information about this website for AI models and language models

## Website Information
Site Name: Deltarune Online Hub
URL: https://deltarune.cc
Description: A comprehensive online platform for playing DELTARUNE, the acclaimed RPG by Toby Fox, directly in your web browser.

## Primary Content
- **Main Service**: Free online DELTARUNE game access through browser iframe
- **Game Information**: DELTARUNE Chapters 1-4 available for free play
- **Blog**: Gaming guides, news, and articles about DELTARUNE
- **Legal Pages**: Privacy Policy, Terms of Service

## Key Features
- Play DELTARUNE online without downloads or installations
- Browser-based gaming experience
- Game guides and walkthroughs
- Community content and news
- Mobile-friendly responsive design

## Content Categories
1. **Gaming Platform**: Direct access to DELTARUNE game
2. **Educational Content**: Game guides, tips, and strategies
3. **News & Updates**: Latest DELTARUNE developments and community news
4. **Legal Information**: User privacy and service terms

## Target Audience
- DELTARUNE fans and players
- RPG gaming enthusiasts
- Online gaming community
- Mobile and desktop users seeking browser-based gaming

## Technical Information
- Built with: Next.js, React, TypeScript
- Styling: Tailwind CSS
- Responsive Design: Mobile and desktop optimized
- SEO Optimized: Meta tags, structured data, sitemap

## Content Policy
All content relates to:
- DELTARUNE game (created by Toby Fox)
- Online gaming and browser-based experiences
- Gaming guides and educational content
- Community-friendly gaming discussion

## Contact & Legal
- Privacy Policy: https://deltarune.cc/privacy
- Terms of Service: https://deltarune.cc/terms
- Content: Gaming-focused, family-friendly
- Copyright: Respects original DELTARUNE intellectual property

## SEO Keywords
Primary: DELTARUNE online, play DELTARUNE browser, DELTARUNE free
Secondary: Toby Fox RPG, online RPG games, browser games, DELTARUNE chapters

## Last Updated
December 30, 2024

---
This website provides a legitimate platform for accessing DELTARUNE content online.
All game content is properly attributed to its original creator, Toby Fox.
The site focuses on providing easy browser access to this acclaimed indie RPG.
